pubexchange.headline: Study Suggests Our Brains Have a 'Sixth Sense'
pubexchange.description: But it involves numbers, not ghosts

article_metadata.description: New research reveals people have a so-called "sixth sense." No, it’s not the ability to see dead people. Think more ...  Rain Man . It’s referred to as “numerosity"—or... Science News Summaries. | Newser
article_metadata.title: Study Suggests Our Brains Have a 'Sixth Sense'
